item.title: Breaking The Habit
item.description: [[songs/z/zeromancer/eurotrash/send_me_an_angel.md#empty-dreams-can-only-disappoint-vyl-wnanory|Memories consume like opening the wounds]] [[songs/z/zeromancer/eurotrash/send_me_an_angel.md#empty-dreams-can-only-disappoint-vyl-wnanory|I’m picking me apart again]] [[songs/z/zeromancer/eurotrash/send_me_an_angel.md#empty-dreams-can-only-disappoint-vyl-wnanory|You all assume I’m safe here in my room]] [[songs/z/zeromancer/eurotrash/send_me_an_angel.

item.title: Don’t Stay
item.description: [[songs/t/the_cardigans/gran_turismo/my_favourite_game.md#im-losing-my-favourite-game-losing-my-favourite-vyl-wnanory|Sometimes I need to remember just to breathe]] [[songs/t/the_cardigans/gran_turismo/my_favourite_game.md#im-losing-my-favourite-game-losing-my-favourite-vyl-wnanory|Sometimes I need you to stay away from me]] [[songs/t/the_cardigans/gran_turismo/my_favourite_game.md#im-losing-my-favourite-game-losing-my-favourite-vyl-wnanory|Sometimes I’m in disbelief I didn’t know]] [[songs/t/the_cardigans/gran_turismo/my_favourite_game.

item.title: Easier to Run
item.description: [[songs/t/tricky/blowback/excess.md#youve-gotta-ask-therell-be-a-new-tale-vyl-wnanory|It’s easier to run]] [[songs/t/tricky/blowback/excess.md#youve-gotta-ask-therell-be-a-new-tale-vyl-wnanory|Replacing this pain with something numb]] [[songs/t/tricky/blowback/excess.md#youve-gotta-ask-therell-be-a-new-tale-vyl-wnanory|It’s so much easier to go]] [[songs/t/tricky/blowback/excess.md#youve-gotta-ask-therell-be-a-new-tale-vyl-wnanory|Than face all this pain here all alone]] [[songs/i/infected_mushroom/army_of_mushrooms/the_pretender.

item.title: Faint
item.description: [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/time_to_dance.md#she-didnt-choose-this-role-vyl-wnanory|I am a little bit of loneliness, a little bit of disregard]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/time_to_dance.md#she-didnt-choose-this-role-vyl-wnanory|A handful of complaints but I can’t help the fact]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/time_to_dance.

item.title: Figure.09
item.description: [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/jesus_christ.md#i-know-youll-come-in-the-night-like-a-thief-vyl-wnanory|Nothing ever stops all these thoughts and the pain attached to them]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/jesus_christ.md#i-know-youll-come-in-the-night-like-a-thief-vyl-wnanory|Sometimes I wonder why this is happening]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/jesus_christ.

item.title: From the Inside
item.description: [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.md#youre-perfect-yes-its-true-vyl-wnanory|I don’t know who to trust, no surprise]] [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.md#youre-perfect-yes-its-true-vyl-wnanory|(Everyone feels so far away from me)]] [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.md#youre-perfect-yes-its-true-vyl-wnanory|Heavy thoughts sift through dust and the lies]] [[songs/p/pantera/the_great_southern_trendkill/suicide_note_pt_i.

item.title: Hit the Floor
item.description: [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.md#youre-perfect-yes-its-true-vyl-wnanory|There are just too many times that people have tried to look inside of me]] [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.md#youre-perfect-yes-its-true-vyl-wnanory|Wondering what I think of you and I protect you out of courtesy]] [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.

item.title: Lying From You
item.description: [[songs/c/cypress_hill/rise_up/get_it_anyway.md#imma-do-my-thing-let-me-tell-you-right-now-vyl-wnanory|When I pretend everything is what I want it to be]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/rise_up/get_it_anyway.md#imma-do-my-thing-let-me-tell-you-right-now-vyl-wnanory|I look exactly like what you had always wanted to see]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/rise_up/get_it_anyway.

item.title: Nobody’s Listening
item.description: [[songs/z/zanias/into_the_all/idoru.md#coming-home-vyl-wnanory|Coming at you]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/hybrid_theory/points_of_authority.md#you-like-to-think-youre-never-wrong-forfeit-the-game-vyl-wnanory|Peep the style and the kids checking for it]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/hybrid_theory/points_of_authority.md#you-like-to-think-youre-never-wrong-forfeit-the-game-vyl-wnanory|The number one question is how could you ignore it]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/hybrid_theory/points_of_authority.

item.title: Numb
item.description: [[songs/t/the_killing_tree/the_romance_of_helen_trent/switchbalde_architect.md#youre-all-i-want-to-know-vyl-wnanory|I’m tired of being what you want me to be]] [[songs/t/the_killing_tree/the_romance_of_helen_trent/switchbalde_architect.md#youre-all-i-want-to-know-vyl-wnanory|Feeling so faithless, lost under the surface]] [[songs/t/the_killing_tree/the_romance_of_helen_trent/switchbalde_architect.md#youre-all-i-want-to-know-vyl-wnanory|Don’t know what you’re expecting of me]] [[songs/t/the_killing_tree/the_romance_of_helen_trent/switchbalde_architect.

item.title: Somewhere I Belong
item.description: [[songs/p/pianos_become_the_teeth/the_lack_long_after/ill_be_damned.md#maybe-your-heaven-is-that-norman-rockwell-scene-vyl-wnanory|(When this began) I had nothing to say]] [[songs/p/pianos_become_the_teeth/the_lack_long_after/ill_be_damned.md#maybe-your-heaven-is-that-norman-rockwell-scene-vyl-wnanory|And I’d get lost in the nothingness inside of me]] [[songs/p/pianos_become_the_teeth/the_lack_long_after/ill_be_damned.md#maybe-your-heaven-is-that-norman-rockwell-scene-vyl-wnanory|(I was confused) And I let it all out to find]] [[songs/p/pianos_become_the_teeth/the_lack_long_after/ill_be_damned.
